item.title: trdsql
item.description: Download This is the document of trdsql, a tool that can execute SQL on CSV, LTSV, JSON, TBLN files. overview trdsql is a CLI tool that executes SQL on text in table format. A tabular format is data that consists of rows and columns, such as: 1 column 2 columns 1 row a1 a2 2 lines b1 b2 Since the results can be output in various formats, it can also be used for format conversion of tabular data.

item.title: ov
item.description: Feature-rich terminal pager Download Note Please refer to the github for installation and settings. Features ov provides more convenient functions by separating text, not just the pager function to display at terminal size. It is particularly suitable for displaying table-formatted text. Can open large files quickly. Supports fixed header line display (both wrapped and unwrapped). Supports column mode that recognizes columns by delimiter. In column mode, there is a column rainbow mode that colors each column.
